Text:
Am I blind, or is the Inner Sea World Guide - one of the most important books in this line - not here?

Hardly matters, granted. Most of the information from it is somewhere in here, including the older book it takes the place of, and any one of the adventure paths alone is probably enough to keep you going for a year.  But still, I was specifically hoping to find that book...
Oh, and Cities of Golarion is in here twice (once with and once without the ID PZO9214 in front of it). Might want to fix that if there's another update.

@platypode - you can find it in my latest release: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6662661

Cities of Golarion corrected, thanks :)
